short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables pretty printing of the learning cards from miamed's amboss tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are using the Amboss learning system, this extension helps you to print your learning cards by formatting them for the printer. 

Simply open up a learning card in Chrome and open Chrome's printing dialog (Ctrl+P)

This extension is dedicated to Julia! <3

by Christian Amann and Martin Perzl
